statements: SELECT faq_id, question, response FROM faq_responses;
SELECT question, response, faq_id FROM faq_responses;
SELECT response, faq_id, question FROM faq_responses;
SELECT * FROM faq_responses WHERE faq_id = 1;
SELECT question, response FROM faq_responses WHERE response LIKE '%example%';
SELECT question, response FROM faq_responses WHERE faq_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM faq_responses WHERE faq_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT response FROM faq_responses WHERE question LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM faq_responses ORDER BY faq_id DESC;
SELECT question FROM faq_responses WHERE faq_id = 1 OR faq_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question FROM faq_questions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT response FROM faq_responses;
SELECT id, response FROM faq_responses WHERE question_id = 2;
SELECT id, question FROM faq_questions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question FROM faq_questions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT faq_questions.question, faq_responses.response FROM faq_questions JOIN faq_responses ON faq_questions.id = faq_responses.question_id;
SELECT response, question_id FROM faq_responses ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question, response FROM faq_questions JOIN faq_responses ON faq_questions.id = faq_responses.question_id WHERE faq_questions.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question, created_at FROM faq_questions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT response FROM faq_responses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM faq_users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM faq_users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions WHERE id > 5;
SELECT question, created_at FROM faq_questions WHERE created_at > '2020-01-01';
SELECT response, question_id FROM faq_responses WHERE response LIKE '%good%';
SELECT id, username, email FROM faq_users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM faq_users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com' AND username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question_text FROM faq_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_text, topic_text FROM faq_questions JOIN faq_mapping ON faq_questions.question_id = faq_mapping.question_id JOIN faq_topics ON faq_topics.topic_id = faq_mapping.topic_id;
SELECT * FROM faq_responses WHERE response_id = '3e86be44-0e4d-4ee6-8db9-3a24b39d5d7b';
SELECT topic_text, COUNT(question_id) AS question_count FROM faq_mapping JOIN faq_topics ON faq_mapping.topic_id = faq_topics.topic_id GROUP BY topic_text ORDER BY question_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question_text FROM faq_questions WHERE question_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT response_text FROM faq_responses WHERE response_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT question_text, response_text FROM faq_questions JOIN faq_responses ON faq_questions.question_id = faq_responses.response_id;
SELECT topic_text FROM faq_topics WHERE topic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002';
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question_text FROM faq_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM faq_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM faq_responses WHERE response_id = 10;
SELECT category_name FROM faq_categories ORDER BY category_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM faq_questions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT response_text, category_name FROM faq_responses JOIN faq_categories ON faq_responses.response_id = faq_categories.category_id;

SELECT faq_questions.question_text, faq_responses.response_text FROM faq_questions JOIN faq_relations ON faq_questions.question_id = faq_relations.question_id JOIN faq_responses ON faq_responses.response_id = faq_relations.response_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_questions FROM faq_categories JOIN faq_relations ON faq_categories.category_id = faq_relations.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_questions DESC;
